## Align Environment

The align environment also produces numbered equations:

$$
\begin{align}
\nabla \cdot \mathbf{E} &= \frac{\rho}{\varepsilon_0} \label{eq:gauss} \\
\nabla \times \mathbf{E} &= -\frac{\partial \mathbf{B}}{\partial t} \label{eq:faraday}
\end{align}
$$

We can reference these with `\eqref`: see \eqref{eq:gauss} and \eqref{eq:faraday}.
